name: Dinosaur Dungeon
description:
Dinosaur Dungeon is a game where you explore a dungeon full of puzzles, hidden traps and as the title has it, Dinosaurs!

Dinosaur Dungeon is a prototype and a concept piece for a larger and more ambitious project with a solid foundation. It has been heavily influenced by the original design pitch for the unreleased N64 game originally known as 'Dinosaur Planet'.

Credits :

Graphics, Design & Programming by Stephen Robert Spiteri

Dungeon Music by Lewis Condrey

Contact Info :

twitter.com/@straw_dev

batburritogames.com

Recommended Specs :

Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10

1GB Ram

Features :

  • 3D collision system for creating stairs, bridges and hovering objects / characters
  • All characters behave by the same rule set
  • Event planning system for creating independent puzzles, traps and events
  • Dynamic Lighting with independent light sources
  • Challenging AI with enemies to simulate swashbuckling combat.
  • Uncapped frame-rate
  • Full controller support

Notes :

  • Keys currently not re-bindable, however this is planned functionality
  • Graphics scale to display resolution
  • Game may crash if controller is disconnected during gameplay (Game Maker Studio bug)
